name: small group personal training
desc: Our Small Group Personal Training is unlike anything you'll have experienced before. In micro training groups of just 6:1, all your workouts are customised, recorded and coached by an experienced personal trainer. The balance of the motivational group environment and 1-2-1 attention makes it the perfect mix to produce fast results, without the bounce back
